title: Victoria's favourite things
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: The results of July 2004 's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'
description: Check out what people brought to ACMI for July's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. Recorded live in ACMI's Screen Pit, the event was modelled on a 1960's variety show and includes songs, stories, bad jokes and some really interesting stuff.
